name: next-firebase-starter-kit
description: Express server side rendering Next.js application on Firebase Cloud Functions with Firebase Hosting
author: Maxime Joly

scripts.preserve: cross-env CONFIG_ENV=development npm run build-all && npm run copy-deps && npm run install-deps
scripts.predeploy: cross-env CONFIG_ENV=development npm run build-all && npm run copy-deps
scripts.deploy: firebase use dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=production firebase deploy
scripts.build-all: npm run build-public && npm run build-functions && npm run build-server && npm run build-app
scripts.build-server: mkdirp dist/functions/public && ncp src/app/public dist/functions/public && tsc src/app/server.ts --outDir dist/functions --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build-app: next build src/app && ncp src/app/.next dist/functions/.next
